title: Travel insurance claim forms and settlement letters
dataVerified: Claimant name, policy number, claim details, settlement amount, insurer
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents altered claim settlements. Domain binding verifies insurer. Claim payment verification. Prevents double-claim fraud. Tax documentation (claim proceeds).
